author: Sukhada Tatke
title: India's sex workers fight for survival amid coronavirus lockdown
description: Overnight loss of income from core clientele plunges the marginalised group into depths of anxiety and deprivation.
content:
Mumbai, India - The Indian government's decision to impose a strict lockdown in an attempt to curb the spread of the new coronavirus last month has triggered a mass exodus of migrant workers from cities as economic activity came to a standstill.
